snippet: A government review of electronic voting results from Venezuela’s recent election has been completed and confirmed the victory of President Nicolás Maduro, the head of the National Electoral Council said.
abstract: Government review of voting results from Venezuela’s latest election confirms victory of Pres Nicolas Maduro, handpicked successor of former president Hugo Chavez.
lead_paragraph: A government review of electronic voting results from Venezuela’s recent election has been completed and confirmed the victory of President Nicolás Maduro, the head of the National Electoral Council said.
